snippet: Borussia Dortmund needed a stoppage-time goal for its 10th straight win to start the season, beating Krasnodar, 2-1, in the Europa League.
abstract: Borussia Dortmund beats Krasnodar, 2-1, for 10th straight win at start of Europa League; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Borussia Dortmund needed a stoppage-time goal for its 10th straight win to start the season, beating Krasnodar, 2-1, in the Europa League.

headline.print_headline: Header Gives Borussia Dortmund 10th Straight Win
headline.main: Header Gives Borussia Dortmund 10th Straight Win
